subcategory.name: Feature Sections
subcategory.description: Feature section examples for Tailwind CSS, designed and built by the creators of the framework.
subcategory.introduction: Use these Tailwind CSS feature section examples to highlight the most important features of your product or service. These examples are designed and built by the Tailwind CSS team, and include a variety of different styles and layouts.

NotificationSetting.jsx
App.jsx
import { useState } from 'react'
import { Switch } from '@headlessui/react'

function Example() {
	const [enabled, setEnabled] = useState(true)

	return (
		<form action="/notification-settings" method="post">
			<Switch checked={enabled} onChange={setEnabled} name="notifications">
				{/* ... */}
			</Switch>
			<button>Submit</button>
		</form>
	)
}
